name: Queen of Hatred
description: In the name of Love and Justice, I shall punish you!
flavourText: The magical girl of love and justice has arrived.
managerialTips: When the work result was Bad, Qliphoth Counter lowered.
If the Qliphoth Counter reaches 0, she will breach.
Requires constant attention to maintain her 'Hero' persona.

name: Cenobite
description: We have such sights to show you.
managerialTips: Work result 'Bad' will immediately cause a breach.
Employees with Prudence IV or lower will panic immediately.
Sacrifice is required for better results.

name: My Valentine
description: The one and only subject of my extraction.
flavourText: Contains infinite amounts of affection and chaos.
managerialTips: Chocolate supply must be maintained at all times.
Do not ignore for more than 5 minutes.
